sentences.en: "This food is divine," they murmur, falsely.
sentences.cn: “这东西好吃极了，”他们言不由衷地低声说。

sentences.en: He swore falsely that he had seen me that morning.
sentences.cn: 他不真实地发誓那天早晨他看到过我.

sentences.en: He was falsely charged with robbery.
He was falsely jovial, with his booming, mirthless laugh.
sentences.cn: 他低声苦笑了几声，装出快乐的样子。

sentences.en: Irene smiled falsely at her unwelcome visitor.
sentences.cn: 爱伦对不受欢迎的访客虚情假意地微笑.

sentences.en: Maybe the boy did not do it and was falsely accused.
sentences.cn: 也许并不是这个小伙子干的,只是遭人诬陷而已.

sentences.en: One achievement often falsely attributed to Franklin, however, is that he discovered electricity.
sentences.cn: 一项被错误地归功于富兰克林的成就，便是他发现了电。

sentences.en: Selling deliberately a commodity whose registered trademark is falsely used may constitute a crime.
sentences.cn: 销售明知是假冒注册商标的商品可构成犯罪.

sentences.en: She apologized for accusing him falsely.
sentences.cn: 她为错误地咒骂他而道歉。

sentences.en: She smiled falsely at her unwelcome visitor.
sentences.cn: 她虚情假意地对不受她欢迎的访客微笑.

sentences.en: So far from admitting his own mistake, he falsely accused his critic.
sentences.cn: 他非但不认错, 还倒打一耙.

sentences.en: Somebody has falsely claimed the watch.
The book is falsely fathered on Homer.
sentences.cn: 这本书被误认为是荷马的著作.

sentences.en: The company had falsely claimed that its products were biodegradable.
sentences.cn: 公司谎称他们的产品是可生物降解的.

sentences.en: The secretary was falsely convicted of forgery.
sentences.cn: 秘书被判伪造罪很冤枉.

sentences.en: The whole groups of species sometimes falsely appear to have been abruptly developed.
sentences.cn: 整个的物种群有时会假象地表现为突然发生的.

sentences.en: Why should he be falsely modest and pretend?
sentences.cn: 他为什么非得故作谦虚,装模作样 呢 ?

words.tran_cn: 说谎；假话；不真实；错误的信仰

trans.tran_cn: 虚伪地，不实地，错误地，冒
